org.openimaj.image.feature.local.interest

Interface InterestPointDetector<T extends InterestPointData>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of InterestPointData
    All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStructureTensorIPD, AffineAdaption, HarrisIPD, HessianIPD, LaplaceIPD, QuadratureIPD, RidgeIPD

    public interface InterestPointDetector<T extends InterestPointData>
extends Cloneable
    A detector of interest points.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
